definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: The thermistor unbalanced bridge is widely used in temperature measuring circuits.
sentences.chinese: 不平衡电桥在热敏电阻测温电路中应用十分广泛。

sentences.english: The temperature measurement using neutron resonance spectrum has many advantages comparing traditional techniques of temperature measurement.
sentences.chinese: 中子共振测温与传统的测温技术相比，具有很多优势。

sentences.english: The temperature measurement using neutron resonance spectrum has many advantages comparing traditional techniques of temperature measurement.
sentences.chinese: 中子共振测温与传统的测温技术相比，具有很多优势。

sentences.english: Resistance temperature sensor makes temperature setting more accurate, safe and hygienic.
sentences.chinese: 电阻式测温棒使温度设定更精准，更安全卫生。

sentences.english: Effects of the medium in radiation transmitting path on infrared thermometry have been analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了幅射传递通道中的介质对红外测温的影响。

sentences.english: Spectro-balance thermometry method is a new approach for the noncontact measurement of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 调谱平衡测温法是一种新的非接触测温方法。

sentences.english: Spectro-balance thermometry method is a new approach for the noncontact measurement of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 调谱平衡测温法是一种新的非接触测温方法。

sentences.english: A new characteristie equation for radiation thermometers has been put forward in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出辐射测温的一种简单线性化公式。

sentences.english: Moreover, a detailed discussion is made on the flaw due to applying separable components or elements to thermometric systems for vacuum metallurgy plant.
sentences.chinese: 详细论述了真空炉测温系统用分立元件法检定弊端。

sentences.english: The measurement results show that it is avaliable for the system of pyroelectric infrared measuring temperature to realize practional utilization.
sentences.chinese: 测试结果表明，热释电红外测温系统有望实现实用化。

sentences.english: Measures to be taken in infrared measurement at the soaking section of a reheating furnace are put introduced through actual examples.
sentences.chinese: 通过实例介绍了加热炉均热段红外测温应采取的措施。

sentences.english: They have a comparison, analysis and calculation to different radiant temperature measuring meter.
sentences.chinese: 对不同类型的辐射测温计进行了比较分析计算。

sentences.english: Temperature measurement by laser is an advanced method for measuring temperature.
sentences.chinese: 激光测温是一种先进的温度测量方法。

sentences.english: The circuit of measuring temperature in the automatic vacuum calorimeter is improved.
sentences.chinese: 对自动真空量热仪的测温电路进行了改进。

sentences.english: The forehead thermometer is much easier to use.
sentences.chinese: 这个前额测温的体温计愈加便当运用。

sentences.english: The origin of the deposit explored by using the microprobe, inclusion thermometry. isotope assay etc. is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 利用包体测温及同位素等测试资料探讨了矿床成因。

definition: to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
